title: Rift Rivals: Pacific Rift tickets on sale now

replies.body: Hey I'm trying to buy a premium ticket but when I got to ticketmaster.com, it says 403 no access. Are they sold out?

Hey Irvine - I've just tried going through the process to buy Premium tickets, and have reached the Payment screen with no problems. Maybe try clearing your browser cache and trying again? If not, there's a pink 'HELP' button in the lower left corner on Ticketmaster, try hitting them up. Hope you get it sorted!
Got a swag bag once with the promise of a skin but never got the skin ><
what is in the swag bag?
honestly man i have no clue hopefully they tell us soon
